display.name: TODO Compaction Blocks
display.description: Shows number of blocks planned to be compacted.

display.name: TODO Compactions
display.description: Shows number of compaction operations to be done.

display.name: TODO Deletions
display.description: Shows number of blocks that have crossed their retention periods.

display.name: TODO Downsamples
display.description: Shows number of blocks to be downsampled.

display.name: Group Compactions
display.description: Shows rate of execution of compaction operations against blocks in a bucket, split by compaction resolution.

display.name: Group Compaction Errors
display.description: Shows the percentage of errors compared to the total number of executed compaction operations against blocks stored in bucket.

spec.query:
(
      sum by (namespace, job) (
        rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_failures_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
    /
      sum by (namespace, job) (
        rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
  )
*
  100

display.name: Downsample Rate
display.description: Shows rate of execution of downsample operations against blocks stored in a bucket, split by resolution.

display.name: Downsample Errors
display.description: Shows the percentage of downsample errors compared to the total number of downsample operations done on block in buckets.

spec.query:
(
      sum by (namespace, job) (
        rate(thanos_compact_downsample_failed_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
    /
      sum by (namespace, job) (
        rate(thanos_compact_downsample_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
  )
*
  100

display.name: Downsample Durations
display.description: Shows the p50, p90, and p99 of the time it takes to complete downsample operation against blocks in a bucket, split by resolution.

display.name: Sync Meta Rate
display.description: Shows rate of syncing block meta files from bucket into memory.

display.name: Sync Meta Errors
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of meta file sync operation compared to total number of meta file syncs from bucket.

spec.query:
(
      sum by (namespace, job) (
        rate(thanos_blocks_meta_sync_failures_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
    /
      sum by (namespace, job) (
        rate(thanos_blocks_meta_syncs_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
  )
*
  100

display.name: Sync Meta Durations
display.description: Shows p50, p90 and p99 durations of the time it takes to sync meta files from blocks in bucket.

display.name: Deletion Rate
display.description: Shows the deletion rate of blocks already marked for deletion.

display.name: Deletion Errors
display.description: Shows rate of deletion failures for blocks already marked for deletion.

display.name: Marking Rate
display.description: Shows the rate at which blocks are marked for deletion (from GC and retention policy).

display.name: Bucket Operations
display.description: Shows rate of executions of operations against object storage bucket.

display.name: Bucket Operation Errors
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of operations against object storage bucket.

spec.query:
(
      sum by (namespace, job, operation) (
        rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_failures_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
    /
      sum by (namespace, job, operation) (
        rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operations_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
  )
*
  100

display.name: Bucket Operation Latency
display.description: Shows latency of operations against object storage bucket.

display.name: Halted Compactors
display.description: Shows compactors that have been halted due to unexpected errors.

display.name: Garbage Collection
display.description: Shows rate of execution of removal of blocks, if their data is available as part of a block with a higher compaction level.

display.name: Garbage Collection Errors
display.description: Shows the percentage of garbage collection operations that resulted in errors.

display.name: Garbage Collection Durations
display.description: Shows p50, p90 and p99 of how long it takes to execute garbage collection operations.

display.name: CPU Usage
display.description: Shows the CPU usage of the component.

display.name: Memory Usage
display.description: Shows various memory usage metrics of the component.

display.name: Goroutines
display.description: Shows the number of goroutines being used by the component.

display.name: GC Duration
display.description: Shows the Go garbage collection pause durations for the component.
